biotools.summary: In order to estimate the coefficient of the gene interactions NIR solves a linear regression problem for each gene considering a fixed number of k regressors. The regressor set is chosen according the residual sum of square error (RSS) minimization criterion. In this version, this tool exhaustively searches the best regressors in the space of all the possible k-tuples of genes.
